name: Claudio Games
description:
Claudio Games is a puzzle plateformer where the hero, a robot named Claudio needs to reach a portal to progress through the different stages. The particularity of the game is that you can't control Claudio, he walks by himself and reacts to his environment. The only action you can do is to add blocks to interact with him and help him reaching the portal.

    Basically, you only have two buttons to learn to be able to play : left click to add normal blocks and right click to add boucing blocks that will make Claudio jump. But there are a lot of different options to help you to play more easily and we're working on a tutorial that is now missing...

    Obviously, there are many obstacles on the road you'll need to make Claudio avoid such a classical spikes and monsters but also gravity switchers that add some fun to the game. Though it can first seem easy to handle, the difficulty increases quite fast, and you'll need skill and patience to complete all the 48 main stages.

    The game also includes a level editor to create your own stages you'll be able to send to your friends and a random level generator for hours of fun and billions of differents stages.

    Game by Alexis Roux, Cécile Morelle and Maxime Lemahieu
